metadata.title: Guided Pivots - DomainTools Iris Investigate
metadata.description: Given a domain return all the Iris Investigate data, highlighting fields where < 200 domains share an attribute to clue investigators in to retrieve more data via Iris Investigate UI (or further queries using the Iris Investigate API).
metadata.prerequisites: A DomainTools API Key provisioned for Iris Investigate. Visit https://www.domaintools.com/integrations to request a trial key.

body.message:
Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')} Email Domain: @{variables('email_domain_value')}
Average Risk Score:  @{div(variables('email_domain_domain_risk'),variables('email_domain_domain_risk_count'))}
@{body('Email_Domain_Table')}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')} Email Domain:
@{body('Reverse_Email_Domain')?['response']?['message']}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')} IP Address: @{variables('ip_address_value')}
Average Risk Score:  @{div(variables('ip_address_risk_score'),variables('ip_address_risk_score_count'))}
@{body('Create_IP_Address_Table')}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')} IP Address:
@{body('Reverse_IP')?['response']?['message']}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')}  MX Host: @{variables('mx_host_value')}
Average Risk Score:  @{div(variables('mx_host_domain_risk'),variables('mx_host_domain_risk_count'))}
@{body('MX_Host_Table')}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')}  MX Host:
@{body('Pivot_MX_Host')?['response']?['message']}

@{body('MX_IP_table')}

Pivot Results for @{variables('domain_name')} MX IP Address:
@{body('Pivot_by_MX_IP')?['response']?['message']}
